  <script>
   // Buffer functions which raise the events
    var nielsenDcrEventBuffer = []
    var nielsenDcrInitialised = false
    var nielsenSdk = undefined
    var nielsenMetadata = undefined
    var _nolggGlobalParams = {
        sfcode: "dcr",
        apid: "P7BD24941-5183-495B-858B-845D29C44A7C",
        apn: "perthnow",
        nsdkv: "511"
    };

    function replayBufferedEvents() {
        // If NOLCMB is undefined nielsen has been blocked but
        // still fired the onload event. Nothing we can do
        if (typeof NOLCMB === 'undefined') {
            return
        }

        try {
            nielsenSdk = NOLCMB.getInstance(_nolggGlobalParams.apid)
            nielsenSdk.ggInitialize(_nolggGlobalParams)

            nielsenMetadata = {
                type: 'static',
                dataSrc: 'cms',
                assetid: window.location.pathname,
            }

            nielsenMetadata.section = 'home'
            
            
            
            

            console.debug(nielsenMetadata, 'Firing Nielsen hard page load')

            nielsenSdk.ggPM('staticstart', nielsenMetadata)
        } catch (err) {
            console.error('Nielsen hard page load error', err)
        }

        nielsenDcrEventBuffer.forEach(function(event) {
            event()
        })
        nielsenDcrEventBuffer = []
        nielsenDcrInitialised = true
}
  </script>
  <script async="" onload="replayBufferedEvents();" src="//cdn-gl.imrworldwide.com/novms/js/2/ggcmb510.js">
  </script>
